contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 30, 2019 D Scottish Challenge Shield
Scottish Challenge Shield 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Scottish BBA Festival of Brass scottish-challenge-shield
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Perth Concert Hall, Perth, Perth & Kinross, Scotland, UK Best 1st section: Unison Kinneil Best 2nd section: Broxburn & Livingston Best 3rd section: Perthshire Brass Best 4th section: Dundee Instrumental
Best Instrumentalist: Ian Campbell (Euphonium, Unison Kinneil)
Bands asked to play a composition by a Scottish composer Best First Section - Unison Kinneil Best Second Section - Broxburn and Livingston Best Third Section - Perthshire Brass Best Fourth Section - Dundee Instrumental Best Instrumentalist - Solo Euphonium, Unison Kinneil
Nov. 6, 2019, 2:18 p.m. June 10, 2020, 1:37 p.m.
1 Unison Kinneil Band Chris Shanks Metropolis 1927
2 1st Old Boys Association Band (Belfast) Stephen Cairns The Essence of Time
